actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend section 236 of the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 relating to user fees for Customs services at certain small airports.

summary.text: Amends the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 to delete the provision that requires user fees collected by the Customs Service at certain small airports to be deposited in a special funds within the Treasury that shall be available only to pay for customs services at such airports.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 236 of the Trade and Tariff Act of 1984 relating to user fees for Customs services at certain small airports.
